ygData.subject: Re: Lower Guk (long) (was Grrrrrrrr!)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nope, no secret wall - just go a little deeper past the spider room.  You ll take a few turns, then you ll see a door on your right with gargs clustered
ygData.messageBody:
James Schuldes wrote:

> If you camp the BR, you can pull to the room between room spawns. I used
> the right side hall and pulled vampire bat's. Then went to the right again
> and saw a hall to some deadly black widows. Pulled them using lament -
> worked good and if you get 3 bugs that's nowhere near as bad as 5 GIBS. But
> me being careful I spent the time to pull singles (well ok I did get a
> couple doubles.)
>
> But what I wanna know is where are the basalt gargs? Did I not go deep
> enough or is there a secret door/illusionary wall?

Nope, no secret wall - just go a little deeper past the spider room. You'll take a
few turns, then you'll see a door on your right with gargs clustered around it. 3
there, I think, that can be either basalt or clay. We want basalt, of course. :)
Was very easy to pull single gargs there using lament. Then, if you go a little
further you'l reach the bridge leading into the tower, with the 3 caster froggies
straight in front of you, and a few more gargs up in an alcove on the left. I
had trouble lamenting the caster froggies for some reason, always ended up
with all 3 at once. :) Thank goodness for pixie strike and elemental...

-Lohengrin, 45th bard of Rallos Zek

>
> Sylly
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 23, 1999 1:38 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Lower Guk (long) (was Grrrrrrrr!)
>
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> > PS. Can anyone tell me what level Greater Ice bones are, I
> was in the
> > bedroom in L Guk with my group and we had cleared the
> area. I went round
> ------
> There are two paths leading out of the BR and they both very
> shortly empty
> into the same room. This room, the "bat room", has a
> passage leading off to
> the left and to the right. Most people are heading left as
> that takes you
> over toward the assassin, etc. and most of lower guk. The
> bat room room has
> a couple of frog spawns and some sonic bats. Here's the
> tricky part. The
> invis vs undead that you got at the zone doesn't help you
> with the bats,
> only the frogs, however, if you hug the wall going left
> pretty tightly then
> the bats won't agro on you.
>
>
> >
